text.div: This code system http://www.nubc.org/PriorityTypeOfAdmissionOrVisit defines many codes, but they are not represented here

name: AHANUBCPriorityTypeOfAdmissionOrVisit
title: AHA NUBC Priority Type Of Admission Or Visit
description: UB-04 Priority (Type) of Admission or Visit (FL-14).
copyright:

No other publication—governmental or private/commercial—can be considered authoritative. See their website for licensing terms and conditions.
